response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and capabilities, it's truly a game-changer in its field. Given its value and quality, I believe it's worth more than what most people pay for similar products. However, I understand that every individual has their own valuation, so I'm extending this opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This offer includes not only the product itself but also a comprehensive warranty and a personalized setup service to ensure you get the most out of it. I trust that you'll find this proposal compelling. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 9500}
